source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

spells.description: Use: Be the center of attention. (10 Sec Cooldown)

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 387 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to lase your target for Precision Blasting, calling in Mister Lock-N-Stalk to deal 848,102 Physical damage to your target.
Use: Recalibrate for Mass Destruction. (20 Sec Cooldown)
